title: Hausa village
creator_credit: Joan Duff, Central Office of Information and Taurus Productions
brief_description: Describes the Hausa people of northern Nigeria, a muslim people whose customs are often primitive, making a living from fishing and farming. The film is a survey of their communal life, their customs and culture, their ceremonies and traditions.
creator_credit_for_label: Joan Duff, Central Office of Information and Taurus Productions
